mapper.select: SELECT A.COMPANY_CD , A.DIVISION_CD , A.PACKING_ID , A.SHIPPING_NO , A.SHIPPING_ORDER_ID , MSM.SHIPPING_NM , A.PACKING_CONTAINER , A.ITEM_ID , A.SHIPPING_UOM , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_UNIT_NAME(A.COMPANY_CD, A.DIVISION_CD, A.SHIPPING_UOM) FROM DUAL) AS SHIPPING_UOM_NM , A.QTY AS SHIPPING_QTY , TO_CHAR(MSM.SHIPPING_DUE_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SHIPPING_DUE_DATE , MSM.DESCRIPTION , A.SHIPPING_ORDER_ID AS KEY_ID FROM (SELECT DISTINCT MPD.COMPANY_CD , MPD.DIVISION_CD , MPD.PACKING_ID , MSD.SHIPPING_NO , MSD.SHIPPING_ORDER_ID , MPD.PACKING_CONTAINER , MSD.ITEM_ID , MSD.SHIPPING_UOM , MSD.QTY FROM MOM_PACKING_DTL MPD , MOM_SHIPPING_ORDER_DTL MSD WHERE MPD.COMPANY_CD = MSD.COMPANY_CD AND MPD.DIVISION_CD = MSD.DIVISION_CD AND MPD.REFERENCE_DTL_NO = MSD.SHIPPING_ORDER_ID AND MPD.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MPD.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MPD.PACKING_ID = #{packingId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) A , MOM_SHIPPING_ORDER_MST MSM WHERE A.COMPANY_CD = MSM.COMPANY_CD AND A.DIVISION_CD = MSM.DIVISION_CD AND A.SHIPPING_NO = MSM.SHIPPING_NO

SELECT MPD.COMPANY_CD , MPD.DIVISION_CD , MPD.PACKING_ID , MPD.SEQ , MPD.ITEM_ID , MI.ITEM_NM , MI.ITEM_SPEC , MI.ITEM_TYPE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MI.COMPANY_CD, MI.DIVISION_CD, 'MD0002', MI.ITEM_TYPE, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS ITEM_TYPE_NM , MPD.LOT_ID , MPD.PACKING_UOM , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_UNIT_NAME(MPD.COMPANY_CD, MPD.DIVISION_CD, MPD.PACKING_UOM) FROM DUAL) AS PACKING_UOM_NM , MPD.PACKING_QTY , MPD.CONVERSION_UOM , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_UNIT_NAME(MPD.COMPANY_CD, MPD.DIVISION_CD, MPD.CONVERSION_UOM) FROM DUAL) AS CONVERSION_UOM , MPD.CONVERSION_QTY , MPD.REFERENCE_NO AS SHIPPING_NO , MPD.REFERENCE_DTL_NO AS SHIPPING_ORDER_ID , MPD.PACKING_DETAIL_ID , MPD.DESCRIPTION , MPD.UPDATE_BY AS UPDATE_USER_NO , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_USER_NAME(MPD.COMPANY_CD, MPD.DIVISION_CD, MPD.UPDATE_BY) FROM DUAL ) AS UPDATE_USER_NM , TO_CHAR(MPD.UPDATE_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPDATE_DATE , ROWIDTOCHAR(MPD.ROWID) AS KEY_ID FROM MOM_PACKING_DTL MPD , MOM_ITEM MI WHERE MPD.COMPANY_CD = MI.COMPANY_CD AND MPD.DIVISION_CD = MI.DIVISION_CD AND MPD.ITEM_ID = MI.ITEM_ID AND MPD.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MPD.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MPD.PACKING_ID = #{packingId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MPD.REFERENCE_NO = #{referenceNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MPD.REFERENCE_DTL_NO = #{referenceDtlNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
